comments.body: This is still happening to the customer
Fixed, tested on latest CIBuild, provided testcase to the customer.
QE team needs to add a test case so leave the fixed tickets in resolved state.

Closing issue

Tested with Ti Studio build 2.1.0.201206172244
Ti Mobile SDK2.1.0.v20120618134156 hash r00905cd0
OSX Lion 10.7.3
Nexus S OS 4.0.4

The expected behavior is shown
